author: Special Correspondent
text:
Cotton was auctioned for Rs. 1.20 crore at the Agricultural Producers Cooperative Society at Konganapuram near here on Saturday.

DCH cotton

While DCH cotton variety fetched a price between Rs. 5,600 and Rs. 6,460 per bag; the surabhi variety fetched a price between Rs. 4,400 and Rs. 4,920.

More than 7,000 cotton bags were auctioned for Rs. 1.20 crore, Agricultural Producers Cooperative Society sources.
title: Cotton auctioned for Rs. 1.20 crore
